cause.description:
The ACLU has been a foundation for American Society since its inception in 1920. It has worked tirelessly over the years to make sure that civil liberities are respected (even in times of national emergency) in this country.
1. Protect your rights.
2. Join your local chapter.
cause.mission: preserve every man's rights to equal protention under the law as stated in the United States Constitution.
cause.name: Protect Your Rights!
